query:
select
                    t.id as id,
                    t.name as name,
                    t.description as description,
                    t.body as body,
                    t.created_at as created_at,
                    t.updated_at as updated_at,
                    array_agg((
                        i.id,
                        i.name,
                        i.default_value,
                        i.template_id
                    )) as "inputs!: Vec<InputEntity>"
                from templates as t
                left join inputs as i
                    on t.id = i.template_id
                group by t.id
